title: Manage IPs
listingTabIpDescription: My public IP addresses and associated services
listingColumnsIpAntiDDosPermanentTooltip: Anti-DDoS Scrubbing Center is permanently enabled for this IP. Please use with caution
listingColumnsIpAntiDDosAutomaticTooltip: The anti-DDoS infrastructure automatically protects this IP if an attack is detected.
listingColumnsIpAntiDDosInActionTooltip: Suspicious traffic detected. Anti-DDoS cleaning centres are actively mitigating this attack.
listingColumnsIpAntiDDosPendingTooltip: Reconfiguring anti-DDoS... It will be applied in a few moments.
listingColumnsIpEdgeFirewallEnabledToolt: Network Edge Firewall is currently protecting this IP by filtering incoming traffic. Click to configure.
listingColumnsIpEdgeFirewallDisabledTool: Traffic does not pass through the Network Edge Firewall unless an attack is detected. In the event of an attack, it will be automatically activated. Click to configure.
listingColumnsIpEdgeFirewallPendingToolt: Reconfiguring Network Edge Firewall... It will be applied in a few moments. Click to configure.
listingColumnsIpGameFirewallAvailableToo: The Game Firewall is available but not configured at this time. To enable protection, configure your game rules. Click to configure.
listingColumnsIpGameFirewallPendingToolt: Reconfiguring Game Firewall... It will be applied in a few moments. Click to configure.
listingQuickFilterShowParkedIps: Show IP addresses on Parking (unused) only
listingTerminateByoip_info1: This IP block is part of a larger BYOIP block. Please go to <Link>my services</Link> and choose ‘cancel’ if you would like to cancel your BYOIP service.
listingTerminateByoip_info2: This IP block is part of a larger BYOIP block. Please use the API <Link>(link)</Link> if you would like to cancel your BYOIP service.
listingActionManageSubnetInVrack: Manage IPv6 subnets in the vRack
listingUpsertDescriptionSuccessMessage: The description of the {{value}} IP has been updated.
listingTerminateIp_success: The request to cancel your {{service}} service has been processed. You will receive an email to confirm it.
listingTerminateIp_ftc_success: The request to cancel your {{service}} service has been processed. A confirmation email has been sent to you.
listingManageMitigation_permanent_title: Switch Network Scrubbing Centre to permanent mitigation
listingManageMitigation_permanent_questi: Are you sure you want to enable permanent Scrubbing Centre mitigation on the {{t0}} IP? Please use this option with caution (in most cases, using automatic mitigation is recommended).
listingManageMitigation_permanent_succes: Permanent mitigation will be enabled on the {{t0}} IP shortly.
listingManageMitigation_permanent_failed: An error has occurred enabling permanent mode on the {{t0}} IP.
listingManageMitigation_auto_title: Switching Network Scrubbing Centre to automatic mode
listingManageMitigation_auto_question: This way, you can enable the default protection settings on the {{t0}} IP.
listingManageMitigation_auto_success: Mitigation will switch to automatic mode on the {{t0}} IP in a few moments
listingManageMitigation_auto_failed: An error has occurred switching the mitigation to automatic mode on the {{t0}} IP.
listingSettingsImportIpFromSys: Import IP addresses from SyS to OVHcloud
listingExportIpToCsv: Export IP addresses to a CSV file
survey_link_tooltip: Like this page? Send us your feedback!
